full_summary:
**Block 2 Façade and Structural Systems Investigations**
================================================ ENUMERATION AT01

### Title
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (DPSG) is soliciting a request for proposal (RFP) for the retention of a qualified contractor to conduct an investigation of the structural system and façade of one or more buildings within the National Capital Region (NCR). ENG AT01, ENG AT01 COM NF680.

### Reference Information
* **Reference Number**: WS3855089331-Doc3855210488
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3855089331
* **Publication Date**: February 2, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 16, 2023, at 14:00 HNE (Eastern Time)
* **Contract Start Date**: February 16, 2023
* **Contract End Date**: December 31, 2023

### Solicitation Details
The selected contractor will be required to provide specialized skills for comprehensive investigations of the structural system and façades. Minimum fields of specialization include:

* Structures and Building and Construction and Manufacturing Components and Supplies
* Interior finishing materials
* Commercial and office building construction services
* Interior finishing and furnishing and remodeling services

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services.

### Submission Requirements
* Submission deadline: February 16th, 2023, at 14:00 HNE, Eastern Time
* Submission shall include all required supporting documentation and bid submission files, as outlined in the solicitation document.

### Evaluation Method
Evaluation will be based on the lowest price. 

### Contact Information
For further information regarding the RFP, please contact [Lisa Hampel](mailto:lisa.hampel@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
